short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick access to EXOS portals and services

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The EXOS Client Assistance extension is a powerful tool that streamlines the process of submitting and tracking support tickets for our valued EXOS clients. With just a few clicks, you can easily submit a new ticket and provide detailed information about your issue. Our extension also allows you to check the status of your open tickets, so you can stay informed and up-to-date on the progress of your support requests. Whether you're a busy professional or a casual user, this extension makes it easy for you to get the help you need, when you need it. With its intuitive interface and seamless integration with our ticketing system, the EXOS Client Assistance extension is the perfect solution for EXOS clients looking for quick and efficient support.

*Note this extension only works for EXOS clients.
